species.name: boldore
descriptions: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.
If you see its orange crystals start to glow, be wary. It’s about to fire off bursts of energy.
It explores caves in search of underground water. It’s not comfortable around water, so this Pokémon takes great care in lapping it up.
It relies on sound in order to monitor what’s in its vicinity. When angered, it will attack without ever changing the direction it’s facing.
Its orange crystal is a mass of energy. Just one crystal fragment would provide enough fuel for a hundred dump trucks.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

abilities.name: weak-armor
abilities.effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

abilities.name: sand-force
abilities.effect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
